entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Snow mixed with rain late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 07:27 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 07:27 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:27 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
